(Armor Negating [armornegating], Shock [shock], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 40A to forge (A5)

A blade forged during a thunderstorm and tempered by lightning, this sword crackles and hisses, striking enemies with lightning. The wielder of the sword is resistant to lightning and may send Thunder Strikes against his enemies.
